titleInfo.title: Salle Hypostyle de Grand Temple à Karnak

mods.abstract: Hypostyle Hall, Temple of Amen at Karnak (New Kingdom Dynasty XIX); Egyptian man stands among fragmented closed papyrus columns, incised with cartouche of Rameses II, below lintels; "Zangaki No 984 Salle Hypostyle de Grand Temple a Karnak" in white along bottom of print. (Number on object is 2/696)

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of the Friends of Egyptology, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee
